scripts.build: node -e "console.log(child_process.execSync(os.type()==='Windows_NT'?'ng.cmd build --watch false --output-path dist':'ng build --watch false --output-path dist', {cwd: 'client'}).toString('utf8'))"
scripts.live_build: node -e "console.log(child_process.execSync(os.type()==='Windows_NT'?'ng.cmd build --watch true --output-path dist':'ng build --watch true --output-path dist', {cwd: 'client'}).toString('utf8'))"
